title: President Donald J. Trump Recognizes the Importance of Small Businesses During 2018 Small Business Week – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Economy & Jobs	

Issued on:
April 30, 2018
Small business owners embody the American pioneering spirit and remind us that determination can turn aspiration into achievement.
						President Donald J. Trump					CRITICAL TO THE ECONOMY: Small businesses are responsible for a significant portion of U.S. economic activity and are vital asset to the economy.POLICY THAT WORKS: President Donald J. Trump’s efforts to cut taxes, regulatory reform, and improve the Nation’s business climate provides huge benefits for small businesses.SMALL BUSINESSES ARE BOOMING: Under President Trump’s leadership, small business optimism and the economy have reached historic levels.
